value:
What path will this realm follow?
It's not my place to make any pivotal
decisions. You must help them.

I once had to make a hard decision:
to side with the kingdom of my
birth or with the one that raised me.

It reassures me to see you do
patrols. I used to do the same at
my castle. Brings back memories!

I wish I could show you my castle.
There's so much to do there. It's even
got a tree house—where I sleep!

I was just thinking about my siblings.
I've got quite a few. Do you have
any brothers or sisters?

I've come with greetings from
$Nf.$k$pVery nice castle you have here!

I've become so strong thanks
to everyone's help.

Good. I'll be able to help more
folks now.
It seems I didn't get much stronger...
Let's see what I can do now!

I'm Corrin—raised in Nohr but born in
Hoshido. I devote my Yato blade to
your cause, and my dragon power!

It's good to see you. We've spent
so much time together, I'm uneasy
when you're not around.$k$pI'd like to just keep you where I
can see you, but people would
call me overprotective. Heh.$k$pI've felt...overprotected my whole
life, so it's a strange feeling to
want to do it myself.$k$pYou are obviously essential to the
realm's defense, so it's natural to
protect you, I suppose.$k$pI guess I'm saying we've got your
back, so don't worry about what
path to choose. Just keep going.
はっ！
でやっ！
うああっ
No...
We won't give up!
I've made my choice!
I choose...to stop you!
My path is certain!
This can't be...
Heehee
Thank you very much for looking out for everyone.
Between friends, even the smallest gestures can mean so much.
I have so many siblings. I'm very fortunate.
Ever made a choice that, either way, meant losing something you loved?
I grew up in a fortress, where I was...never allowed outside.
I'm certain that you've chosen the path of peace.
You can lean on me if you're weary. My brothers may be bigger, but I can shoulder more than my share.
All right.
Let's go.
Of course.
